title: Create a page!
paragraph: Watched the video and excited to try out StaticPage? Click the registration button and sign up for free during the beta testing period instead of $19 a year.

title: Built for you.
paragraph: Impressed but don’t have the time to build a page yourself? Don’t worry I got you! Contact me with the details of your page and I will get back to you with a proposal and a time estimate.
